pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo tiracchānavijjaṃ pariyāpuṇanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:6.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo tiracchānavijjaṃ pariyāpuṇissanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:7.1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:7.2: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:7.4: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo tiracchānavijjaṃ pariyāpuṇissantī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:7.5: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo tiracchānavijjaṃ pariyāpuṇantī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:7.8: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo tiracchānavijjaṃ pariyāpuṇissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:7.9: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:7.10: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:9.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:11.2: padena pariyāpuṇāti, pade pade āpatti pācittiyassa.
